errorTitle: There was a problem with the analysis
errorCause2: Access to results denied or expired
supportInfo: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
disclaimer: The results of the psychometric analysis are for informational purposes only and do not constitute a medical diagnosis.
enterCodePrompt: Enter your access code to the results of the psychometric analysis
codeInfo: You received the access code in an email after completing the psychometric test.
codeTooShort: The access code is too short

promptCatalog.title: Universal Catalog of Capabilities
promptCatalog.description: This catalog contains 80 analytical templates designed for the systematic and multi-level processing of a raw analytical report into personalized, useful, and strategic insights. It is a tool for decision-makers that shows the capabilities of our test and encourages them to try more of them.

categories.6: Personal Development and Shadow Integration Strategy

1_1.title: Operating System Metaphor
1_1.benefit: Understand the person's internal 'operating system', their main drive, key programs, and potential system errors.

1_2.title: Personal Mission Statement
1_2.benefit: Discover the essence of the person's most important aspirations, formulated as their personal mission statement.

1_3.title: Main Driving Force
1_3.benefit: Identify and describe the main, positive driving force that motivates the person to act.

1_4.title: Main Aversive Brake
1_4.benefit: Understand what is the strongest brake and source of internal resistance for the person.

1_5.title: Hierarchy of Needs
1_5.benefit: See how the person's key psychological needs are arranged in a personalized hierarchy.

1_6.title: Balance TOWARDS vs. AWAY FROM
1_6.benefit: Assess whether the person's motivation is driven more by striving 'TOWARDS' something or escaping 'AWAY FROM' something.

1_7.title: Energy Level
1_7.benefit: Describe the person's default level and style of life energy – whether it is constant or eruptive.

1_8.title: Sources of Inspiration vs. Frustration
1_8.benefit: Get a clear table comparing what inspires and energizes the person versus what frustrates them.

1_9.title: Description for a Biographer
1_9.benefit: See how the essence of the person's contribution to the world could be described in an encyclopedia.

1_10.title: Decision-Making Core
1_10.benefit: Understand what mental filters (logical, intuitive, etc.) the person uses when making important decisions.

2_1.title: Superpowers Catalog
2_1.benefit: Receive a list of 3-5 key 'superpowers' of the person, along with their description and psychometric components.

2_2.title: Analysis of Key Sublimation
2_2.benefit: Explore how the person's most sublimated talent manifests in various areas of life.

2_3.title: Superpower User Manual
2_3.benefit: Learn how the person can consciously activate, nurture, and protect their strongest superpower.

2_4.title: Talent Description for LinkedIn
2_4.benefit: Generate a ready-to-use, attractive description of unique talents for the 'About' section on LinkedIn.

2_5.title: Monetizing Talents
2_5.benefit: Discover 3 specific business or professional models that allow for the monetization of the strongest talents.

2_6.title: Synergy of Talents
2_6.benefit: Understand how the combination of two seemingly distant talents creates a unique, synergistic whole.

2_7.title: Hidden Resource - Ambivalence
2_7.benefit: See how consciously managing internal ambivalence can become a hidden resource.

2_8.title: Talents in a Team Context
2_8.benefit: Describe the unique value that a person with this profile brings to a team and what roles they naturally assume.

2_9.title: Resources for 'Fighting Dragons'
2_9.benefit: Learn what internal resources the person can use to cope with their biggest challenges.

2_10.title: Personal Brand
2_10.benefit: Define 3 key pillars of the personal brand that the person should communicate to the world.

3_1.title: In-depth Analysis of the Main Conflict
3_1.benefit: Understand the person's main neurotic conflict, its dynamics, symptoms, and management strategies.

3_2.title: Analysis of the Main Aversion
3_2.benefit: Describe the 'syndrome' resulting from the strongest aversion, its consequences, and practical workarounds.

3_3.title: Internal Risk Register
3_3.benefit: Receive a table of internal risks, including their description, probability, and mitigation strategies.

3_4.title: Manual for a Manager
3_4.benefit: Generate a confidential guide for a manager, describing how to manage potential and avoid pitfalls.

3_5.title: Analysis of Relational Ambivalence
3_5.benefit: Analyze how internal ambivalence towards strength or gentleness affects close relationships.

3_6.title: Sabotaging Mechanisms
3_6.benefit: Identify 3 potential self-sabotaging mechanisms resulting from the psychometric profile.

3_7.title: Blind Spot Map
3_7.benefit: List 3 'blind spots' that the person may regularly overlook when assessing situations.

3_8.title: Energy Cost of Conflicts
3_8.benefit: Estimate which of the internal conflicts consumes the most of the person's mental energy.

3_9.title: Shadow of a Superpower
3_9.benefit: Discover the 'dark side' of the strongest talents – how they can become weaknesses in certain contexts.

3_10.title: Crisis Scenarios
3_10.benefit: See how the person is likely to react to 3 common crisis scenarios at work.

4_1.title: Professional Archetypes
4_1.benefit: Define 3-5 professional archetypes that best fit the person's profile.

4_2.title: Ideal Work Environment Design
4_2.benefit: Receive a description of the ideal work environment, tailored to the person's aspirations and aversions.

4_3.title: List of 'Anti-Roles'
4_3.benefit: Create a list of 5 specific roles or types of work that the person should avoid for their own good.

4_4.title: Entrepreneur Profile
4_4.benefit: Assess the person's potential as an entrepreneur and identify what kind of partner they need.

4_5.title: Recommended Industries
4_5.benefit: Recommend 3-4 industries where the person's profile can shine the brightest.

4_6.title: 5-Year Career Development Strategy
4_6.benefit: Propose a 5-year strategic career development plan that maximizes talents and avoids pitfalls.

4_7.title: The Ideal Boss
4_7.benefit: Describe the profile of an ideal boss who could bring out the best in this person.

4_8.title: Work Style: Soloist or Team Player?
4_8.benefit: Determine whether the person is more effective as a soloist, expert, or team member.

4_9.title: Ways to Network
4_9.benefit: Propose 3 effective and comfortable strategies for building a professional network, consistent with the person's nature.

4_10.title: Recruitment Questions
4_10.benefit: Receive a list of 5 key questions the person should ask during a job interview.

5_1.title: Communication Profile
5_1.benefit: Create a concise communication profile, describing the preferred style, channels, and topics of conversation.

5_2.title: Guide 'How to talk to me'
5_2.benefit: Generate a friendly first-person guide explaining how to communicate effectively with this person.

5_3.title: Conflict Resolution Style
5_3.benefit: Describe the default conflict resolution style (avoidance, compromise, fight, adaptation).

5_4.title: Coworker Profile
5_4.benefit: Describe what type of coworker the person is and their contribution to the team atmosphere.

5_5.title: In a Partnership
5_5.benefit: Analyze how the person's profile may manifest in a close partnership.

5_6.title: Receiving Feedback
5_6.benefit: Understand how the person likely receives feedback and what form of delivery they prefer.

5_7.title: Building Trust
5_7.benefit: Learn what is key for this person in building trust in relationships.

5_8.title: Interpersonal Boundaries
5_8.benefit: Describe how the person likely sets boundaries in relationships with others.

5_9.title: Role in a Group
5_9.benefit: Determine what social role the person is most likely to take on in a new group.

5_10.title: Language of Love and Appreciation
5_10.benefit: Discover the preferred 'language of love' or appreciation at work for this person.

6_1.title: Development Roadmap
6_1.benefit: Create a 2-year personal development roadmap with 3 paths and specific actions.

6_2.title: Development Priority #1
6_2.benefit: Identify one key area for development that will bring the greatest return on investment.

6_3.title: 'Willpower Muscle' Training Program
6_3.benefit: Propose a 3-stage training program to tame the strongest aversion from the Will vector.

6_4.title: Aversion Management System
6_4.benefit: Create a 5-point system for managing the main aversion from the Temperament vector.

6_5.title: Reading and Course Recommendations
6_5.benefit: Receive a list of 3 books, 2 courses, and 1 podcast that address the person's key challenges.

6_6.title: Shadow Integration Practices
6_6.benefit: Propose 3 specific practices (e.g., journaling) to integrate rejected aspects of personality.

6_7.title: Journaling Questions
6_7.benefit: Receive a list of 10 questions for regular self-reflection to monitor progress.

6_8.title: Creating a Support System
6_8.benefit: Describe what support system (mentor, coach, etc.) would be most beneficial for this person.

6_9.title: Definition of Success
6_9.benefit: Help the person define their own personalized definition of success, consistent with their nature.

6_10.title: Personal Mantra
6_10.benefit: Create a short mantra or affirmation that the person could use in difficult moments.

7_1.title: Radar Profile
7_1.benefit: Generate data in JSON format for a BBT profile radar chart.

7_2.title: Vector Bar Chart
7_2.benefit: Generate data in JSON format for a grouped bar chart showing tensions in 4 vectors.

7_3.title: Reversionary Tension Index
7_3.benefit: Calculate and generate a 'Reversionary Tension Index' as a single JSON value.

7_4.title: Resources vs. Challenges Chart
7_4.benefit: Generate JSON data for two horizontal bar charts comparing resources and challenges.

8_1.title: Leadership Profile
8_1.benefit: Define the person's unique leadership style by synthesizing key personality vectors.

8_2.title: Risk-Taking Profile
8_2.benefit: Analyze the risk-taking profile in different domains (creative, financial, interpersonal).

8_3.title: Ideal Business Partner Model
8_3.benefit: Create a BBT profile of an ideal business partner who perfectly complements the person's profile.

8_4.title: Long-Term Life Trajectory
8_4.benefit: Sketch the person's likely life development trajectory, including potential crises.

8_5.title: Reaction to Success and Failure
8_5.benefit: Describe how the person likely internalizes and reacts to major success and severe failure.

8_6.title: Potential for Deep Work
8_6.benefit: Assess the person's potential for 'Deep Work', identifying supporting and hindering factors.

8_7.title: Relationship with Authority
8_7.benefit: Understand how the person relates to authority structures – are they a rebel, conformist, or reformer.

8_8.title: Sources of Happiness and Fulfillment
8_8.benefit: Discover what, according to the profile, is the true, long-term source of happiness for this person.

8_9.title: Impact of the Digital Environment
8_9.benefit: Analyze how the modern digital environment affects the person's profile, amplifying strengths or weaknesses.

8_10.title: Generating a Research Hypothesis
8_10.benefit: Formulate an interesting research hypothesis in psychology based on the unique features of this profile.
